message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe this product would be incredibly beneficial to you, and this is a very competitive price.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to stay within a budget of $12,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below the value of this product. I could meet you halfway at $13,000, which is a very fair offer.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of your product, I am willing to increase my offer to $13,000. This brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
